data.title: Numerology Calculator
data.constraints: The input [[date]] will be between the years 1000 and 2500.
data.outputDescription: <<1 Line :>> The numerological 'Life Path Number' for this date (1-9, 11, 22, 33, 44 or 55).

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Numerology assigns numbers from 1-9 to different dates of the year by reducing them to their digit sums. However, 'master numbers' 11, 22, 33, 44 and 55 are also valid results.

The process for calculating the 'Life Path Numbers' from dates is shown below for the date 1983/11/20:

Step 1 : Add the digits in each part (year/month/day) separately, if the sum is 10 or greater then add the digits again until you either reach a single digit number (1-9) or a 'master number' like 11 or 22:
1983 → 1+9+8+3 = 21 → 2+1 = 3
11 → 11 (stop on master numbers - 2 digits both the same)
20 → 2+0 = 2
(Note: Only stop on the 2-digit repetitions, do not stop on numbers like 2222 which reduces to → 8)

Step 2 : Add the three separate parts together, then repeat the process on the sum:
1983/11/20 → 3+11+2 = 16 → 1+6 = 7

The final answer is 7. (Valid final answers are 1-9, 11, 22, 33, 44 and 55. An answer of 66 will not be possible as this would need a date like 44/11/11 or 89999/11/11 and these are outside our testing range).
Input
1 Line : A date in the format yyyy/m/d
Output
1 Line : The numerological 'Life Path Number' for this date (1-9, 11, 22, 33, 44 or 55).
Constraints
The input date will be between the years 1000 and 2500.
Example
Input
1000/1/1
Output
3
